title: His Girl Friday
brief_description: Hildy, the journalist former wife of newspaper editor Walter Burns, visits his office to inform him that she’s engaged and will be getting remarried the next day. Walter can’t let that happen and frames her fiancé to keep her in her job.

constellations_other.name: Ladies who own the narrative
constellations_other.description: Despite the lag in making it in mainstream cinema, female action heroes can actually be traced back to the late 19th century in early magic lantern performances of Jane Conquest, who saved both her child and a ship full of men.

description: Hildy, the journalist former wife of newspaper editor Walter Burns, visits his office to inform him that she’s engaged and will be getting remarried the next day. Walter can’t let that happen and frames the fiancé, Bruce Baldwin, for one thing after another, to keep him temporarily held in prison, while trying to steer Hildy into returning to her old job as his employee.
